description: Amazing Stories, volume 7, number 7 (October 1932). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Teck Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: Space-Rocket Murders (Edmond Hamilton), Wrath of the Purple (Howard Fast), The Man Who Fought a Fly (Leslie F. Stone), Upward (Donald Hinson), Infra-Calorescence (R. I. Melhorn), The Swordsman of Sarvon (Charles Cloukey; 3/3), The First Martian (Eando Binder), and The Great Invasion of 1955 (J. D. Reid).
